mapper.insert: INSERT INTO filmgenre(filmgenreno, genreno, filmno) VALUES (filmgenre_seq.nextval, #{genreno}, #{filmno})
mapper.select: SELECT filmgenreno, genreno, filmno FROM filmgenre ORDER BY filmgenreno DESC
SELECT filmgenreno, genreno, filmno FROM filmgenre WHERE filmno = #{filmno} ORDER BY filmgenreno DESC
SELECT g.genreno, g.genrename, f.filmno, x.filmgenreno FROM genre g, film f, filmgenre x WHERE g.genreno = x.genreno AND f.filmno = x.filmno AND f.filmno = #{filmno} ORDER BY g.genreno DESC

SELECT g.genrename, f.filmno FROM genre g, film f, filmgenre x, (SELECT MIN(filmno) AS filmno_min, MAX(filmno) AS filmno_max FROM ( SELECT filmno FROM film WHERE ROWNUM <= 6 ORDER BY filmno DESC )) WHERE g.genreno = x.genreno AND f.filmno = x.filmno AND f.filmno <= filmno_max AND f.filmno >= filmno_min ORDER BY f.filmno DESC
